thread.section_title: Biz2Credit Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Biz2Credit | biz2credit.com
thread.title: Gina Y.

author: Gina Y.
title: Gina Y.
text: We've been in business for 13 years and have been trying to get a business loan to expand operations every since. Traditional banks place stringent requirements on small businesses to take out loans, so we were always hesitant to apply for one. With Biz2Credit, the process was simple. All we had to do was supply some basic information about our business, provide bank statements, merchant statements, and after their verification, we were funded in a week! Would definitely recommend Biz2Credit to all small business owners.
